title: Skater Taliayh - Skin concept
body:
http://img15.deviantart.net/17b1/i/2016/271/7/e/skater_taliyah___weaver_s_wall_by_armand_anims-daj8xml.png

So I had this idea while I was playing as Tal.
http://img00.deviantart.net/0476/i/2016/271/b/2/skater_taliyah___unraveled_earth_by_armand_anims-daj8xlh.png
http://img15.deviantart.net/b557/i/2016/271/c/c/skater_taliyah___seismic_shove_by_armand_anims-daj8xjp.png

Possible changes:
Q - Maybe replace with spare skateboard wheels.
w - Replaced with a ramp.
E -Replaced with really bumpy and overgrown road. A skater's worst nightmare.
R - Replaced with a long wall that she grinds. there are rails also on the wall that she will hop onto after doing a quick trick.

Passive - She hops on a board instead of the rock. When she is idle she will perform manuals.

Edit: Taliyah would probably be a little more rebellious in this skin. I like to think of it like what if she became a professional skateboarder instead of participating in the league. She would probably have special interactions with champions she thinks are lame.

another edit:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C41qdzR0WYo

replies.body: I like it. It would be pretty funny to see actually.
I think so as well. I really would like her ultimate, lol. ^~^
This should be a Skin for Taliyah, Its REALLY good and Interesting

Flip the W and E descriptions
W is Seismic Shove
E is Unraveled Earth

Other than that it does seem like a fun design for her
Flipped. Thanks lol. Was kind of a bit high while making this...
this is awesome, especially how her passive and ult fit this concept, but everything else is  a bit of a stretch.
It could be a stretch but I mean come on! She has everything she needs to board! XD
